component.name: HTTP Inspector
component.summary: HTTP Client to inspect REST Interfaces

p.i: Tests your REST API by sending self defined HTTP requests

description.p: Create multiple requests to different URLs with different HTTP Methods and define HTTP headers, request body with various options to access a web service.

ul.li: Defining HTTP headers for each request.
Tweaking each requests (such as Timeout, Follow Redirection, ..)
Presentation of server response in multiple ways.
